head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HUDSON, JESSE T., JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HUDSON, JESSE T., JR.

block.p: HUDSON-Jesse T., Jr. Age 79. Of Urbanna, VA. Retired Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer with Reynolds Metals Company in Richmond, VA, died Friday, August 25, 2000. He was a member of the Union League Club in New York City. Memorial services will be held Tuesday at 2 PM in Christ Church, Middlesex County, VA.
